price: (Àwọn òpìdán) wí pé: “Mūsā, ìwọ ni o máa kọ́kọ́ ju (ọ̀pá sílẹ̀ ni) tàbí àwa ni a óò kọ́kọ́ jù ú sílẹ̀.”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna awwala man alqā
